message: Accept this generous offer and we can end the game early!
Let's split it down the middle. Your turn to decide!
Take this slightly improved offer and we can still end the game quickly!
I'll take a slightly larger share this time. Your turn to decide!
Meet me in the middle, and let's make a deal!
I'll take a larger share, but I'm still willing to compromise!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm not getting any younger, I want a bigger share now!
You're running out of time, Bob! Take this offer or walk away!
I'm not going down without a fight! Take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'll take the last penny, it's better than nothing!
